publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6003 Mr Frank McAveety: Jock, You’re Immortal Now—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement that Celtic Football Club is to erect a permanent statue in memory of Jock Stein, 25 years on from his passing, one of the most important figures in Scottish football history due to his time managing Celtic, Dunfermline Athletic, Hibernian and Leeds United, as well as the Scottish national team from 1978 until his untimely passing in 1985; notes Stein’s outstanding managerial record as the first manager to lead a British side to winning the European Cup in 1967 and winning 10 Scottish League championships, nine Scottish cups and six Scottish League cups; further notes that Stein has been recognised as both Celtic and Scotland’s greatest ever manager, and believes that this is a fitting tribute to the most successful manager in Celtic’s history.
S3M-6003 Jock, You’re Immortal Now (lodged on 19 March 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-6003 Jock, You’re Immortal Now (lodged on 19 March 2010) Jack McConnell*

S3M-6003 Jock, You’re Immortal Now (lodged on 19 March 2010) David Stewart*, Ken Macintosh*, Patricia Ferguson*, Bill Butler*, Bill Kidd*, Aileen Campbell*, Michael McMahon*, James Kelly*, Christine Grahame*, Pauline McNeill*, John Park*, Mary Mulligan*, Elaine Smith*, Bob Doris*, George Foulkes*, Jackie Baillie*
S3M-6003 Jock, You’re Immortal Now (lodged on 19 March 2010) Liam McArthur*, David Whitton*
S3M-6003 Jock, You’re Immortal Now (lodged on 19 March 2010) Gil Paterson*
S3M-6003 Jock, You’re Immortal Now (lodged on 19 March 2010) Trish Godman*
S3M-6003 Jock, You’re Immortal Now (lodged on 19 March 2010) Marilyn Livingstone*
